faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about AI Body Reshaping

items.title: What changes can I make to my body in photos?
items.description: You can slim down, enhance muscle definition, adjust proportions, and create an overall more flattering appearance tailored to your desires.

items.title: Is AI Body Reshaping free to use?
items.description: Yes! Users receive 30 free credits daily to reshape multiple images. Additional credits can be earned via challenges or purchase. Professional plans are available for frequent users.

items.title: Can I use reshaped images commercially?
items.description: Paid subscribers can use processed images for commercial purposes. Free users are limited to personal use. Review our Terms of Service for more details.

items.title: How is my privacy protected during processing?
items.description: All processing occurs within your browser, ensuring your images are never uploaded or stored externally, keeping everything confidential.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Photos?
footer.description: Try AI Body Reshaping today and see the results instantly. No sign-up needed.
